oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Camp Perry group portrait
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Group portrait of 21 Tennesseans in military uniforms at Camp Perry near Port Clinton, Ohio. On the ground in front of them is a sign that reads "Tennessee. Camp Perry_1913." Features a divided back with handwritten correspondence on reverse. August 25, 1913 postmark.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Group portraits; Military personnel
